All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcceptTower
Interface that defines methods to add and remove Towers
ActionController
ActionController class handle all the messages that all the players have to do during their turn.
ActionControllerTest
Class ActionControllerTest tests ActionController class.
AdditionalInfluence
AdditionalInfluence class contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player, if that player is the activePlayer he has 2 additional points.
AdditionalInfluenceTest
Class AdditionalInfluenceTest tests AdditionalInfluence class.
AddPlayer
Class AddPlayer is used from the server to notify a virtualView's update to the client.
Answer
Interface Answer is implemented by all the messages that will be sent to the client.
AnswerWithString
Interface AnswerWithString is implemented by all the Answer that contains a String.
Assistant
Class Assistant represents a playing card.
AssistantTest
Class AssistantTest tests Assistant class.
BOX
BOX Enum contains all unicode characters used to print the CLI interface
CanAcceptStudent
Objects that implement this interface can receive Students
CanRemoveStudent
Objects that implement this interface can reduce the number of Students they contain
Character
Defines the properties of every Character: cost in coins and a description that summarises its power
CharacterDescription
Values for cost and description of all Characters
CharacterDescriptionTest
Class CharacterDescriptionTest tests CharacterDescription class
CharacterFactory
Factory used to generate random Characters at the start of the game
CharacterFactoryTest
Class CharacterFactoryTest tests CharacterFactory
CharacterInfluence
These characters will change how the influence on an Island is calculated
CharacterInfluenceTest
Class CharacterInfluenceTest tests CharacterInfluence
CharacterMN
This character changes how many steps MN can move
CharacterMNTest
Class CharacterMNTest tests the correct behaviour of CharacterMN
CharacterProf
These Characters will change how Players gain or lose Profs
CharacterProfTest
Class CharacterProfTest tests the correct behaviour of CharacterProf
CharacterTest
Since Character is an abstract class the tests are conducted with objects from a subclass
CharacterWithNoEntry
Class CharacterWithNoEntry models the Character that can limit MN's action on Islands
CharacterWithNoEntryTest
Class CharacterWithNoEntryTest tests the correct behaviour of CharacterWithNoEntry
CharacterWithStudent
These characters will have a number of Students that can be moved from or to a destination In the current implementation the controller will handle the movements of all pawns so this class does not need an implementation of the play() method NOT FINAL
CharacterWithStudentTest
Class CharacterWithStudentTest tests CharacterWithStudent class
ChooseAssistant
ChooseAssistant class is a Request used for requesting to play an Assistant card.
ChooseAssistantController
ChooseAssistantController class is a controller, it is used to visually display Assistant cards and to handle the choice of one of them
ChooseCloud
ChooseCloud class is a Request used for requesting to choose a Cloud.
ChooseColor
ChooseColor class is a Request used for requesting to choose a color.
ChooseColorController
ChooseColorController class is a controller, it is used to display students of five different colors and to handle the choice of the desired color
ChooseIsland
ChooseIsland class is a Request used for requesting to choose a cloud.
ChooseTwoColors
ChooseTwoColors class is a Request used for requesting to switch two students.
CLI
Class CLI represents the terminal UI
Client
Class Client manages the connection of a client with the server.
Cloud
Cloud class contains a list of Student that are contained on the cloud.
CloudTest
Class CloudTest tests Cloud class.
Color
Color Enum contains all ANSI escape codes to change the terminal's text color
ColorS
All the possible Student Colors
ColorT
All the possible Tower Colors
Controller
The Controller will handle messages from all clients by checking their contents and modifying the model's state according to the commands received
CONTROLLERS
Enum CONTROLLERS enumerates all the possible scene with the corresponding path, width and height.
ControllerTest
 
CreateCharacters
Class CreateCharacters notifies the client about the game's characters.
CreateClouds
Class CreateClouds is used from the server to notify about a virtualView's update to the client.
Disconnect
Disconnect class is a Request used for requesting to quit the game.
EntranceToHall
EntranceToHall class is a Request used for requesting a student's move from entrance to hall.
EqualProf
Alternate behaviour for checkProfs method
EqualProfTest
Class EqualProfTest tests the correct behaviour of EqualProf
Eriantys
Class Eriantys is the main class of whole game, where you can choose between client and server.
Error
Class Error is used from the server to notify the client that an error occurred.
ERRORS
Enum ERRORS enumerates all the possible error with the corresponding string that will be sent to the client.
EVENT
All the possible update events
ExpertController
The ExpertController handles messages which represent commands received from all the clients and changes the model's state when the game is played with expert rules
ExpertControllerTest
Class ExpertControllerTest tests ExpertController class.
ExpertGameBoard
Class ExpertGameBoard offers methods to handle a game with expert rules
ExpertGameBoardTest
Class ExpertGameBoardTest tests ExpertGameBoard class.
ExpertModel
 
FullView
Class FullView notifies the client about the game's view.
GameBoard
GameBoard class contains the main logic of Eriantys game, which is divided in areas.
GameBoardTest
Class GameBoardTest tests GameBoard.
GameController
GameController class handles the main Game scene
GameParams
GameParams class contains all the parameters used to create the lobby.
GameStatus
Enum GameStatus containing all the possible status of a game.
GUI
Class GUI represents the graphical user interface.
GUIController
Interface GUIController contains the method setGui that is common to all the controllers.
Hand
Class Hand contains a set of all the Player's available Assistant cards which have a matching back
HandTest
Class HandTest tests Hand class.
HasStrategy<T>
This interface is implemented by classes affected by a character's power
HelpController
 
IMAGE_PATHS
Enum to collect all Image Paths
InfluenceStrategy
InfluenceStrategy interface contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player.
InformationConnection
Class InformationConnection is used from the server to notify about a connection information.
InformationGame
Class InformationGame is used from the server to notify the client about a game's information.
InvalidIndexException
Class InvalidIndexException is thrown when the index position of the card doesn't exist in the player's hand
InvalidMNStepsException
Class InvalidMNStepsException is thrown when a user tries to give a number of Mother Nature steps too high.
Island
Island class contains the attributes and the method to manage the Island of the Game, are considered Island both single Island and group of Island joined together.
IslandTest
Class IslandTest tests Island class.
Join
Join class is a Request used for requesting to join a lobby.
Lobby
Class Lobby manages all the interaction between all the players of a lobby and the controller.
LobbyController
 
LoseController
Class LoseController handles the FXML scene that appears when the player loses
Mage
All Mages types that Players can choose
MNStandard
Normal Behaviour for mnSteps method
MNStandardTest
Class MNStandardTest tests MNStandard Strategy
MNStrategy
Defines the method used to obtain the number of steps from an Assistant
MNTwoSteps
Alternate behaviour for mnSteps method
MNTwoStepsTest
Class MNTwoStepsTest tests MNTwoSteps Strategy
Model
 
MoveMN
MoveMN class is a Request used for requesting the mother nature move.
MoveToIsland
MoveToIsland class is a Request used for requesting a student's move from entrance to an island.
NoColorInfluence
NoColorInfluence class contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player, ignoring a color.
NoColorInfluenceTest
Class NoColorInfluenceTest tests NoColorInfluence class.
NoSuchStudentException
NoSuchStudentException is thrown after an attempt to remove a Student not present in the location
NotEnoughCoinsException
Exception thrown when a Player doesn't have enough coins to play a Character
NotifyDisconnection
Class NotifyDisconnection is used from the server to notify that the client must be disconnected.
NoTowerInfluence
NoTowerInfluence class contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player, without considering the Tower.
NoTowerInfluenceTest
Class NoTowerInfluenceTest tests NoTowerInfluence class.
PHASE
Enum PHASE enumerates all the possible phases in a match.
Ping
Class Ping is used from the server to verify if a client is still connected.
PlaceFullException
Class PlaceFullException is thrown when there is no more available space in the hall of the SchoolBoard for the students of one of the five colors
PlayCharacter
PlayCharacter class is a Request used for requesting to play a character.
Player
Player class represents the Player and contains all the information about him: his nickname, the magical school board he received in the beginning of the game, the color for the towers that he will build, his Assistant cards and in particular the last one he played, the amount of coins he owns etc.
PlayerInterface
This interface exposes the method needed to check if the Player is active
PlayerTest
Class PlayerTest tests Player class.
Pong
Pong class is used to answer to a Ping message.
ProfStrategy
Defines the signature of the method used to calculate who controls Profs
REGEX
Enum REGEX lists all Request message types and their corresponding Pattern used to parse User input
ReplaceCharacter
Class ReplaceCharacter is used from the server to notify about a character's update to the client.
ReplaceCharacterStudents
Class ReplaceCharacterStudents is used from the server to notify about a character's update to the client.
ReplaceCharacterWithNoEntry
Class ReplaceCharacterWithNoEntry is used from the server to notify about a character's update to the client.
ReplaceCloud
Class ReplaceCloud is used from the server to notify about a cloud's update to the client.
Request
Interface Request is implemented by all the messages that will be sent to the server.
SchoolBoard
SchoolBoard represents the magical school board received by each player before the start of the game.
SchoolBoardTest
Class SchoolBoardTest tests SchoolBoard class.
Server
Class Server used to manage new connecting clients, the forwarding of the messages from the socket that handle the client to the right lobby.
ServerMain
Class ServerMain used to start the server on a port, is possible to choose a port or to use the default configuration
SetUpController
This class is the GUIController which handles choosing which host IP and port to connect to.
SocketClientHandler
Class SocketClientHandler manages a single Client connected to the server.
SpecialMoveIsland
SpecialMoveIsland class is a Request used for requesting to move a student of the chosen color on the selected island.
StandardInfluence
StandardInfluence class contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player, when no characterInfluence.
StandardInfluenceTest
Class StandardInfluenceTest tests StandardInfluence class.
StandardProf
Standard behaviour for checkProfs method
StandardProfTest
Class StandardProfTest tests StandardProf Strategy
StudentContainer
Class StudentContainer models a container with a set amount of Students
StudentContainerTest
Class StudentContainerTest tests StudentContainer class.
TurnController
TurnController will handle the selection of the next turn phase by checking if all requirements to change phase are met
TurnControllerTest
Class TurnControllerTest tests the behaviour of TurnController
Update
Interface Update is implemented by all the answers that notify to the client a view update.
UpdateActiveCharacter
Class UpdateActiveCharacter is used from the server to notify about the active character to the client.
UpdateCoins
Class UpdateCoins is used from the server to notify about the game's coins to the client.
UpdateIsland
Class UpdateIsland is used from the server to notify about the game's islands to the client.
UpdateMN
Class UpdateMN is used from the server to notify about mother nature location to the client.
UpdatePlayer
Class UpdatePlayer is used from the server to notify about the game's players to the client.
UpdateProfs
Class UpdateProfs is used from the server to notify about the profs to the client.
UpdateWorld
Class UpdateWorld is used from the server to notify about the game's world to the client.
UserInterface
Interface UserInterface contains all the methods used from all the UI.
VirtualCharacter
VirtualCharacter class is a simplified representation of a Character card.
VirtualCharacterWithNoEntry
VirtualCharacterWithNoEntry class is a simplified representation of a Character card containing no entry tiles.
VirtualCharacterWithStudents
VirtualCharacterWithStudents class is a simplified representation of a VirtualCharacterWithStudents card containing students.
VirtualCloud
VirtualCloud class is a simplified representation of a cloud.
VirtualIsland
VirtualIsland class is a simplified representation of an island.
VirtualLobby
VirtualLobby class is a simplified representation of a lobby.
VirtualPlayer
VirtualPlayer class is a simplified representation of a player.
VirtualSchoolBoard
VirtualSchoolBoard class is a simplified representation of a player's schoolBoard.
VirtualView
VirtualView class is a simplified representation of the gameBoard (and the expert gameBoard).
Welcome
Class Welcome is used from the server to notify the client of the available lobbies.
WinController
Class WinController handles the FXML scene that appears when the player wins
World
World class contains the list of the Islands that represents the world of the game.
WorldTest
Class WorldTest tests World class.
